name: biewer-website
description: Website fÃ¼r die Pension Biewer in Ockfen

scripts.predeploy: rm -rf dist && npm run build && npm run create-domain-link
scripts.style: mkdir -p dist/style && lessc src/style/style.less dist/style/style.css && npm run concat-style && npm run minify-style
scripts.minify-style: cd dist/style && css-minify -f bundled.css -o . && rm bundled.css && mv bundled.min.css bundled.css
scripts.clean-styles: cd dist/style && find . -type f | grep -iv bundled.css | xargs rm && npm run minify-style
scripts.js: mkdir -p dist/js && browserify src/js/Main.js | uglifyjs > dist/js/main.js
scripts.build: npm run style && npm run js && npm run html && npm run img
scripts.pug: pug3 -P src/views/home.pug && mv src/views/home.html dist/index.html && pug3 -P src/views/impressum.pug && mv src/views/impressum.html dist/impressum.html && pug3 -P src/views/datenschutz.pug && mv src/views/datenschutz.html dist/datenschutz.html && pug3 -P src/views/galerie.pug && mv src/views/galerie.html dist/galerie.html && pug3 -P src/views/zimmer.pug && mv src/views/zimmer.html dist/zimmer.html
scripts.dependencies: mkdir -p dist/style && mkdir -p dist/js && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/*.css* dist/style && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/*.js* dist/js
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run server

author: Marc Hein
